plot: Just before the Korean War in a small northern town the daughter of the water dealer and the foreign priest fight hard to keep religious freedom alive.
title: The Water Dealer: Bukjong Mul-jangsu
plot_es: Just before the Korean War in a small northern town the daughter of the water dealer and the foreign priest fight hard to keep religious freedom alive.
plot_en: Just before the Korean War in a small northern town the daughter of the water dealer and the foreign priest fight hard to keep religious freedom alive.
